ns1:MRWebServices__search.param3: SELECT MASTER1.mrID, MASTER1.mrSTATUS FROM MASTER1 INNER JOIN MASTER1_ABDATA ON MASTER1_ABDATA.mrID = MASTER1.mrID WHERE MASTER1.mrASSIGNEES LIKE '%AA_SUPPORT__bCENTER%' AND MASTER1_ABDATA.Email__bAddress NOT LIKE '%northwestern.edu' AND MASTER1_ABDATA.Email__bAddress NOT LIKE '%nm.org' AND MASTER1.mrSTATUS IN ('Open', 'In__bProgress', 'Customer__bResponded') AND MASTER1.submission__btracking = 'Email' ORDER BY mrID ASC FETCH NEXT 15 ROWS ONLY
